name: Zooba!
description:
Hi. We are Astroship M-47 bringing you our project at GMTK Game Jam 2022. In our game you control Zooba and your task is to reach the end of the level, while dodging enemy attacks and destroying them by rolling the dice. However, it's not all that easy. When you roll the dice, you trigger a random event that both helps you and makes it even harder. Good luck!

Unfortunately, this game's release is unstable and only first level works correctly

We will fix existing issues after game jam is over!

LEARNING TO PLAY
  • - use the move character 
  •  - press to crawl into the hole and finish the level
  • to roll dice, press LBM, aim and then release it
  • roll of the die indicates the strangth of the buff or debuff
  • dodge opponents' attacks and dice to avoid taking damage
  • ENJOY
BUFF AND DEBUFF
  •  (+HP) = Add health to the player
  •  (+HP) = Take away a player's health 
  •  (+Enemy) = Spawn new enemies to the level
  •  (-Enemy) = Kill a certain number of opponents on the level
  •  (Shield) = Protect the player with a magic shield
